CaptureSummary: Please capture a bahtinov image to start any adjustments.
CaptureBullet1: Ensure a bright star is centered.
CaptureBullet2: Attach Tri-Bahtinov mask and click “Select Star”.
FocusOnlySummaryFormat: Focus error is {0}. Move focus {1} until it is within tolerance.
FocusOnlyBullet3: Do not adjust collimation screws for a standard Bahtinov mask.
FocusOnlyDoneSummaryFormat: Focus error is {0}, which is within tolerance.
FocusOnlyDoneBullet1: Capture a few more frames to confirm it stays stable.
FocusOnlyDoneBullet2: You can now switch to your imaging target.
FocusOnlyFooterHint: Tip: if the value flips sign while adjusting, you passed through best focus. Use smaller steps.
FocusBalancedSummary: Adjust focus until the three error values are balanced around 0.
FocusAllPositiveBullet: All values are positive. Move the focuser IN in small steps.
FocusAllNegativeBullet: All values are negative. Move the focuser OUT in small steps.
FocusStraddleNotBalancedBullet1: Values straddle 0, but they are not balanced yet.
FocusStraddleNotBalancedBullet2Format: Move the focuser {0} until the 3 error values are evenly spaced around 0.
FocusTargetLineFormat: Target: An average near 0, with similar magnitudes.
FocusOnlyBeginScrewsBullet: Begin collimation adjustments only after this balance is achieved.
FocusFooterHint:
Tip: IN is primary mirror towards secondary or camera towards telescope, 
OUT is primary away from secondary or camera away from telescope
CollimationSummary: Values straddle 0. Proceed with balanced collimation using 2 or more screws at the same time.
DoneSummary: All values are close to zero.
CollimationPositiveInstructionFormat: {0} adjustment - LOOSEN (Counter Clockwise). {0} is too far from the primary.
CollimationNegativeInstructionFormat: {0} adjustment - TIGHTEN (Clockwise). {0} is too close to the primary.
CollimationAdjustTogetherBullet: Adjust these screws together to keep tension balanced.
CollimationFooterHint: Tip: Re-center the star, then refocus until the values straddle 0 again before repeating.
